note.value: Obviously one original bifolio. Probably one more bifolio missing between fols. 48v and 47r (Hebrews 10.32b - 11.24)

The latter part of the text passage overlaps with the Armenian UTOs of Sinai Georgian NF M 13, ff. 62–63, which contains the continuous text of Hebrews 11.35 – 12.7, so it cannot pertain to the same original. A similar overlap is given with the Armenian UTOs of the palimpsest leaf Mingana Chr. Arab. Add. 124 of the University of Birmingham, which contains Hebrews 11.14–33
On fol. 48v there is a marginal gloss pertaining to Hebrews 10:30, referring to Deuteronomy 21; there may be a second gloss further up on this same page
